content: --स्थ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} being or standing in the middle, central. {2} inter. mediate, intervening. {3} middling. {4} mediating, acting as umpire between two parties. {5} impartial, neutral {6} indifferent, unconcerned; मध्यस्यो देशबधुषु <ls>Pt. 4. 60</ls>; वयमव मध्यस्थाः <ls>Ś. 5.</ls> (--स्थः {1} an umpire, arbitrator, a mediator. {2} an epithet of Śiva.
